text: L9.4. Computing Maximurn File Size for Flat Indices Consider a file system with a blocksize of 1024 and disk addresses of length 4 bytes. If we represent files using a flat index with maximum index size of 7338 blocks, what is the maximum size file (in KB that can be represented?
